rules_text:
When Florid Laboratory enters the battlefield, you get {E}. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control, then put a loyalty counter on up to one target planeswalker you control.
{4}{U}{U}, {T}: Proliferate, then proliferate again. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of each kind already there. Then do it again.)[/i]
